alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:10PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow showers. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. In Utah, Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley
